Event.name: loadexception
Event.comment: Fires if an exception occurs in the Proxy during data loading.

Param.name: options
Param.comment: The loading options that were specified (see {@link #load} for details)

Param.name: response
Param.comment: The XMLHttpRequest object containing the response data

Param.name: e
Param.comment: The JavaScript Error object caught if the configured Reader could not read the data.
